entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
